entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
